data.title: Where is Rebecca Liddicoat Now? Age, Divorce, Height, Children
data.meta_description: Rebecca Liddicoat gained prominence as the ex-wife of Robert Griffin III, a former NFL quarterback. Born on August 13, 1988, in Boulder, Colorado, she married
data.text:
Quick Summary

Rebecca Liddicoat gained prominence as the ex-wife of Robert Griffin III, a former NFL quarterback. Born on August 13, 1988, in Boulder, Colorado, she married Griffin in 2013 and they welcomed a daughter, Reese Ann, in 2015. Following their divorce in 2016, Rebecca focused on undisclosed entrepreneurial pursuits while raising her daughter in Texas. This article explores Rebecca Liddicoat’s life, from her early years and educational background to her marriage, divorce, and current endeavors.

Introduction

Rebecca Liddicoat entered the public eye as the wife of Robert Griffin III, a former NFL quarterback known for his stints with teams like the Washington Redskins and the Baltimore Ravens. Her life, initially intertwined with Griffin’s football career, has since taken various turns, prompting curiosity about her current endeavors and whereabouts.

In this comprehensive article, we delve into Rebecca Liddicoat’s background, her life post-divorce, and where she stands today. From her early days in Colorado to her current ventures in Texas, we explore her journey with a focus on personal growth and resilience.

1. Profile of Rebecca Liddicoat

Rebecca Liddicoat, also known during her marriage as Rebecca Griffin, is an American national born on August 13, 1988, in Boulder, Colorado. As of 2023, she is 34 years old and identifies with the Leo zodiac sign. Raised in a supportive Christian family, Rebecca has always maintained a private yet engaging presence in the public eye.

Personal Details

Full Name: Rebecca Liddicoat

Other Names: Rebecca Griffin

Gender: Female

Date of Birth: August 13, 1988

Age: 34 years (as of 2023)

Place of Birth: Boulder, Colorado, USA

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Zodiac Sign: Leo

Religion: Christianity

Sexuality: Straight

Early Life and Family Background

Rebecca was born to Edward and Laura Liddicoat, alongside her elder sister Lindsey. Growing up in Boulder, Colorado, she experienced a nurturing upbringing within a Christian household. Her formative years instilled in her values of faith and family, which have continued to shape her personal and professional choices.

Educational Journey

Rebecca pursued her education at Copperas Cove High School before furthering her studies at Baylor University. At Baylor, she immersed herself in academics and extracurricular activities, majoring in biology. Notably, Rebecca’s leadership skills flourished as she served as the president of the Chi Service Club, highlighting her commitment to community service and academic excellence.

Early Career and Homemaking Role

During her marriage to Robert Griffin III, Rebecca primarily focused on creating a nurturing home environment. Her dedication to homemaking underscored her supportive role as Griffin pursued his NFL career. While her specific career pursuits post-divorce remain undisclosed, Rebecca’s entrepreneurial spirit and resilience have steered her towards new ventures and opportunities.

This section provides a foundational overview of Rebecca Liddicoat’s personal background, early life, and educational achievements. It sets the stage for exploring deeper aspects of her life journey, including her marriage, divorce, and current endeavors.

2. Family and Early Life

Rebecca Liddicoat’s upbringing in Boulder, Colorado, was marked by the loving support of her parents, Edward and Laura Liddicoat, and her elder sister Lindsey. The family environment was deeply rooted in Christian values, shaping Rebecca’s worldview and personal beliefs.

Family Background

Parents: Edward Liddicoat (father) and Laura Liddicoat (mother)

Siblings: Lindsey Liddicoat (elder sister)

Childhood: Rebecca and her sister Lindsey shared a close bond growing up in Boulder. Their parents’ emphasis on faith and family provided a stable foundation for their upbringing.

Early Life in Boulder, Colorado

Rebecca’s childhood was characterized by a blend of academic pursuits and community involvement. Her parents’ guidance and support nurtured her interests and laid the groundwork for her future endeavors. This familial influence would later shape Rebecca’s approach to relationships and personal growth.

3. Educational Background

Rebecca Liddicoat’s academic journey reflects her commitment to excellence and service. From high school to university, she demonstrated leadership and dedication in both her studies and extracurricular activities.

High School and College Years

High School: Rebecca attended Copperas Cove High School, where she excelled academically and participated in various school activities.

College: Upon graduating from high school, Rebecca enrolled at Baylor University, where she pursued a degree in biology. Her time at Baylor was marked by academic achievement and leadership roles within the university community.

Leadership and Community Service

During her college years, Rebecca served as the president of Baylor University’s Chi Service Club, showcasing her passion for community service and altruism. This role not only allowed her to make a positive impact but also honed her leadership skills, preparing her for future responsibilities.

Academic Pursuits and Achievements

Rebecca’s dedication to her studies and her involvement in campus life exemplified her well-rounded approach to education. Her academic achievements and leadership roles underscore her commitment to personal and intellectual growth.

These sections provide a detailed exploration of Rebecca Liddicoat’s early family life and educational background, highlighting pivotal moments and influences that shaped her journey.

4. Marriage to Robert Griffin III

Rebecca Liddicoat’s life took a significant turn when she met Robert Griffin III, popularly known as RG3, during their time at Baylor University. Their relationship blossomed, leading to an engagement in 2010 and a lavish wedding ceremony on July 6, 2013, at the Denver Four Seasons in Colorado.

Relationship and Wedding Details

Meeting and Engagement: Rebecca and Robert first crossed paths at Baylor University in 2009, introduced by mutual friends. Their shared interests and mutual admiration quickly sparked a romantic relationship, culminating in an engagement in 2010.

Wedding Ceremony: The couple’s wedding day was a grand affair held at the Denver Four Seasons, attended by family, friends, and notable NFL personalities. The ceremony celebrated their love and commitment amidst a backdrop of joy and festivity.

Parenthood

In May 2015, Rebecca and Robert welcomed their daughter, Reese Ann Griffin. Parenthood became a central focus of their lives, with Rebecca balancing her role as a supportive spouse and devoted mother.

5. Career and Homemaking

During her marriage to Robert Griffin III, Rebecca Liddicoat dedicated herself primarily to creating a supportive home environment. Her role as a homemaker underscored her commitment to family life, providing a stable foundation as Robert pursued his career in professional football.

Homemaking Role

Supporting Role: As Robert’s career flourished in the NFL, Rebecca assumed the responsibilities of managing their household and providing unwavering support. Her dedication to creating a nurturing home environment reflected her values of family and stability.

Personal Pursuits: While focusing on homemaking, Rebecca’s entrepreneurial spirit and interests in business ventures began to emerge, setting the stage for her post-divorce endeavors.

6. Divorce from Robert Griffin III

Rebecca Liddicoat and Robert Griffin III’s marriage faced challenges, leading to their decision to part ways. The divorce proceedings, initiated in September 2016, highlighted the complexities of their relationship and personal differences.

Reasons for Divorce

Allegations of Infidelity: Speculations arose regarding Robert Griffin III’s alleged involvement in extramarital affairs, which reportedly strained their marriage.

Legal Proceedings: Rebecca filed for divorce citing irreconcilable differences, seeking resolution and stability for herself and their daughter, Reese Ann Griffin.

Settlement and Custody Arrangements: The divorce was finalized with Rebecca receiving a $1.1 million settlement and full custody of Reese Ann. The court also addressed financial support arrangements, ensuring the well-being of Rebecca and their daughter post-divorce.

Life After Divorce

Following the divorce, Rebecca transitioned into a new chapter of her life, focusing on personal growth and entrepreneurial pursuits. Her resilience and determination in navigating post-divorce challenges underscore her strength and adaptability.

7. Life After Divorce

Rebecca Liddicoat’s life took a new direction following her divorce from Robert Griffin III. Embracing a journey of personal growth and independence, she ventured into various endeavors while prioritizing her role as a mother to Reese Ann Griffin.

Entrepreneurial Pursuits

Business Ventures: Post-divorce, Rebecca explored undisclosed entrepreneurial ventures, leveraging her skills and interests to carve a niche for herself.

Personal Development: Her journey of self-discovery and empowerment reflected her resilience in overcoming challenges and embracing new opportunities.

Focus on Motherhood

Parenting Journey: Rebecca’s dedication to raising Reese Ann Griffin remained paramount. She navigated the complexities of single parenthood with grace, ensuring a nurturing environment for her daughter’s growth and development.

8. Physical Attributes

Rebecca Liddicoat is known for her striking physical features and graceful demeanor. Here are the details of her physical attributes:

Height and Build

Height: Rebecca stands tall at 5 feet 10 inches (177 centimeters), accentuating her commanding presence.

Build: She maintains a slender physique, weighing approximately 130 pounds (59 kilograms).

Appearance

Hair and Eyes: Rebecca has lustrous brown hair that complements her warm, brown eyes, adding to her natural allure.

Fitness and Lifestyle

Fitness Regimen: She maintains her physique through regular exercise routines, embodying a commitment to health and well-being.

9. Public Perception and Trivia

Rebecca Liddicoat’s presence in the public eye has garnered intrigue and admiration, accompanied by various perceptions and trivia:

Public Image

Privacy: Known for maintaining a low profile, Rebecca values privacy amidst public curiosity about her personal life.

Support System: Despite challenges, she continues to receive support from admirers and well-wishers who appreciate her resilience and strength.

Trivia

Social Media Absence: Rebecca opts for a private life away from social media platforms, preserving her personal space and focusing on meaningful interactions.

Hobbies and Interests: Outside her professional endeavors, she enjoys traveling, with a fondness for exploring scenic destinations like Switzerland.

Animal Lover: Rebecca shares her life with a pet dog and cat, showcasing her compassion for animals.

10. Conclusion

Rebecca Liddicoat’s journey from a supportive spouse to an independent entrepreneur and devoted mother reflects her resilience and determination. Through highs and lows, she has navigated personal challenges with grace, focusing on personal growth and creating a nurturing environment for her daughter, Reese Ann Griffin. While maintaining a private life, Rebecca continues to inspire admiration for her strength and unwavering commitment to family. Her story serves as a testament to resilience, empowerment, and the pursuit of new beginnings.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Rebecca Liddicoat known for?

Rebecca Liddicoat gained prominence as the ex-wife of Robert Griffin III, a former NFL quarterback. Their marriage and subsequent divorce attracted media attention, highlighting aspects of their personal lives.

How old is Rebecca Liddicoat?

Rebecca Liddicoat was born on August 13, 1988. As of 2023, she is 34 years old.

Where is Rebecca Liddicoat from?

Rebecca Liddicoat was born in Boulder, Colorado, United States. She currently resides in Texas, USA.

Does Rebecca Liddicoat have children?

Yes, Rebecca Liddicoat has a daughter named Reese Ann Griffin, born on May 21, 2015, during her marriage to Robert Griffin III.

What does Rebecca Liddicoat do now?

After her divorce from Robert Griffin III, Rebecca Liddicoat has focused on undisclosed entrepreneurial pursuits while prioritizing her role as a single mother to Reese Ann.

Is Rebecca Liddicoat active on social media?

No, Rebecca Liddicoat maintains a private life and is not active on social media platforms.

How tall is Rebecca Liddicoat?

Rebecca Liddicoat stands at 5 feet 10 inches (177 centimeters) tall.

What is Rebecca Liddicoat’s ethnicity?

Rebecca Liddicoat is of White ethnicity.

Rebecca Liddicoat received a $1.1 million settlement in her divorce from Robert Griffin III, along with full custody of their daughter, Reese Ann Griffin.

Does Rebecca Liddicoat have any siblings?

Yes, Rebecca Liddicoat has an elder sister named Lindsey.

Where did Rebecca Liddicoat go to school?

Rebecca Liddicoat attended Copperas Cove High School and later pursued higher education at Baylor University, where she studied biology.

These frequently asked questions provide key insights into Rebecca Liddicoat’s life, career, and personal details based on common inquiries.
